issue.title: [Docs] Improve styling/readability of tables in the new doc theme
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12541](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12541). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the new doc theme, tables don't have a border / different background as the rest of the body. We can add some striping to let them stand out more.
